events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car on a busy intersection last night.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the reported keywords and description.
An auto claims specialist has been assigned to evaluate and manage the customer's vehicle collision case.
The claim has been acknowledged and confirmation sent to the customer with next steps in the process.
Requested police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the damages from the customer for further assessment.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including photos and the official police report of the accident.
The investigation of the collision claim has begun, focusing on damage assessment and liability analysis.
Investigation is complete; damages verified and liability determined, pending settlement proposition.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage estimate and policy coverage details.
Customer responded to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the amount and timeline.
The claim has been approved to proceed with the agreed settlement payment to the customer.
The settlement payment has been successfully processed and issued to the customer's bank account.
The claim file has been closed following successful settlement and customer confirmation of receipt.
All claim documents and records have been archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
